body.name: Andency King Size Comforter Set Beige, 3 Pieces Boho Bedding Comforters & Sets, All Season Soft Tufted Farmhouse Bed Set (104x90In Comforter & 2 Pillowcases)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 29 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Superior Fabric: Andency beige comforter features a reversible design with delicate and lovely tufts on the front, stunningly soft and skin-friendly brushed microfiber on the reverse, providing you with a comfortable night's sleep all year round!

Boho Design: Elegant embroidered tufts and crisp diamond lines will add a sophisticated touch to your space. This solid tone boho comforter is a flexible piece that will complement and integrate with your existing room decor.

Ultra Fluffy: Our tufted comforter set is filled with premium down alternative microfiber, which is extremely fluffy and lightweight. This cloud-like soft comforter bedding sets allow you to maintain cozy and warm sleep every night in all seasons.

Package Includes: King size comforter set includes 1 comforter (104x90 inches) with 2 pillowcases (20x36 inches). When you receive the shabby chic comforter, please wash and dry it. You may also expose it to sunlight and gently tap it; it will re-fluff nicely after hours.

Easy Care: This bedding comforter set is machine washable. For lasting comfort, it's highly recommended to machine wash on a gentle cycle separately with cold water, sun-dry or tumble dry at low when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it reminds me of soft, fluffy hotel comforters
reviews.reviewText: I ended up buying one for my extra bedroom after getting one for my master room. it holds it shape and texture even after multiple washes, the color is still great (i have a house full of animals, it gets washed every wednesday)It is so fluffy! light weight enough to not smother us at night but still heavy enough to keep us warm. I'm seriously considering buying a couple more in different colors just so i have them for when im ready to change things up. I'm so picky with textures and the weight of my blankets so its not always easy finding a comforter thats JUST right, but this one is literally perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this comforter, keeps me warm and I wish I bought it sooner. I do have a King sized bed and decided to size up and buy the California King sized comforter. I was not disappointed!! This item is super soft, lightweight and beautifully designed. I do personally recommend, if you have a twin sized bed, buy the full sized comforter; if you have a queen sized bed buy the king sized comforter and etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Pleasantly surprised.
reviews.reviewText: Was scared at first when I opened box as it was very small. Realized it was vacuum packed and easily fluffed up when opened. Very soft, was not wrinkled, and looks so good on my bed. I ordered the king size and am very pleased. We will see how it looks once it is washed. But coming out of the package it is very pretty. The price is just crazy for this quality of a light comforter. Can't go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, nice looking
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought the full size beige one for my granddaughter and she loved it. Over the holidays I stayed with them and she gave me her room, so I had an opportunity to experience it myself. I'm a hot sleeper and this was perfect, warm enough on the cooler nights and comfy on the warmer nights. It's a great weight and looks nice. My son really liked it too, so I got him the king size grey one for his birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and good color
reviews.reviewText: The orange is exactly like it’s pictured and what I was looking for. The comforter is soft. Definitely not a thick fluffy comforter and quite thin but I was looking for something thinner since we sleep hot. It works for what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY FAVORITE COMFORTER EVER!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't believe how small the box was when it arrived I mistook it for the sheets I ordered to match. I actually thought that because of the package size I was going to return it because I doubted it would be the fluffy blanket I pictured. Well it was vacuum sealed and puffed right up. I couldn't believe how comfortable it was. I actually used it as a pillow and a blanket it was that cozy. I now look forward to crawling into bed. Seems to be made very well for the price. It's lightweight but fluffy and it is perfect to keep you warm but not be suffocating. LOVE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This comforter is soft, lightweight and warm
reviews.reviewText: After twenty minutes fluffing up in the dryer, my comforter was lofty and ready to be spread onto my bed. It covers the king size bed well - if you feel like it's not a good fit, try rotating 90 degrees. Though very lightweight - maybe a bit lighter than I prefer - the comforter is plenty warm. I've been using an electric blanket on some cover nights and found that the electric blanket was too much warmth with this comforter. It's very pretty and really pleasantly soft to the touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget Friendly Comforter
reviews.reviewText: Exceptional comforter offering remarkable value for its price. Not only does it excel in affordability, but its aesthetic appeal is also noteworthy. The design adds a touch of sophistication to any bedroom, making it a visually pleasing addition to your decor. The comforter's quality exceeds expectations within its budget-friendly range, ensuring a cozy and stylish sleep experience without breaking the bank. Highly recommended for those seeking both comfort and aesthetic charm at an affordable cost.
